name: MIS Activity Attendance For FOI
description:
The report returns a list of prisoners, currently in the establishment and their activity attendance status for a date range. The data is shown over 4 tabs: All Attendance by Activity Service Description, by Surname and by Attendance Status. 4th tab also displays attendance comments and If a Case Note Warning entry has been issued. 5th tab display details of the Warning types. The report can be displayed by individual Wing or by all Wings.
ACT0021 - v00.00.05 Last Modified: 13/05/2017

dataset.name: Activities
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.SURNAME, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.FIRST_NAME, AT_DIM_PROGRAMME_SERVICE.DESCRIPTION, AT_DIM_PROGRAMME_TYPE.DESCRIPTION AS ACTIVITY_DESCRIPTION, TRUNC(AT_FACT_OFFENDER_ACTIVITY.START_TIME) AS ACTIVITY_SESSION_DATE, AT_DIM_ACTIVITY_STATUS.DESCRIPTION AS ACTIVITY_SESSION_STATUS_DESC35 FROM BODIMIS.FACT_OFFENDER_ACTIVITY AT_FACT_OFFENDER_ACTIVITY, BODIMIS.DIM_ESTABLISHMENT AT_ESTABLISHMENT_TAP, BODIMIS.DIM_ESTABLISHMENT AT_ACTIVITY_ESTABLISHMENT, BODIMIS.DIM_OFFENDER_BOOKING AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING, BODIMIS.DIM_PROGRAMME_SERVICE AT_DIM_PROGRAMME_SERVICE, BODIMIS.DIM_PROGRAMME_TYPE AT_DIM_PROGRAMME_TYPE, BODIMIS.DIM_REFERENCE_CODES AT_DIM_ACTIVITY_STATUS WHERE (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK IN (SELECT CSL.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK FROM BODIMIS.DIM_STAFF_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOAD SAC, BODIMIS.DIM_CASELOAD_SECURITY_LIST CSL WHERE SAC.CASELOAD_ID = CSL.CASELOAD_CODE AND SAC.USERNAME = UPPER('DPRWS') AND CSL.ENDYEAR >= TO_CHAR(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, 'YYYY') - 6)) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.ESTABLISHMENT_SK = AT_ESTABLISHMENT_TAP.ESTABLISHMENT_SK) AND (AT_ESTABLISHMENT_TAP.ACTIVE_FLAG = 'Y') AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK = AT_FACT_OFFENDER_ACTIVITY.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK) AND (AT_DIM_PROGRAMME_TYPE.PROGRAMME_TYPE_SK = AT_FACT_OFFENDER_ACTIVITY.PROGRAMME_TYPE_SK) AND (AT_DIM_ACTIVITY_STATUS.CODE_DOMAIN (+) = 'PS_PA_OC') AND (AT_DIM_ACTIVITY_STATUS.CODE (+) = AT_FACT_OFFENDER_ACTIVITY.STATUS) AND (AT_ACTIVITY_ESTABLISHMENT.ESTABLISHMENT_SK = AT_FACT_OFFENDER_ACTIVITY.ESTABLISHMENT_SK) AND (AT_DIM_PROGRAMME_SERVICE.PROGRAMME_SERVICE_SK = AT_FACT_OFFENDER_ACTIVITY.PROGRAMME_SERVICE_SK) AND ((AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.MIS_CURRENT_RECORD_IND = 'Y') AND AT_ESTABLISHMENT_TAP.ESTABLISHMENT_CODE_NK IN ((SELECT establishment_code FROM prompt_), 'BX', (SELECT establishment_code FROM prompt_), (SELECT establishment_code FROM prompt_), (SELECT establishment_code FROM prompt_), (SELECT establishment_code FROM prompt_), (SELECT establishment_code FROM prompt_), (SELECT establishment_code FROM prompt_), (SELECT establishment_code FROM prompt_), (SELECT establishment_code FROM prompt_), (SELECT establishment_code FROM prompt_), (SELECT establishment_code FROM prompt_), (SELECT establishment_code FROM prompt_)) AND AT_ACTIVITY_ESTABLISHMENT.ESTABLISHMENT_CODE_NK IN ((SELECT establishment_code FROM prompt_), 'BX', (SELECT establishment_code FROM prompt_), (SELECT establishment_code FROM prompt_), (SELECT establishment_code FROM prompt_), (SELECT establishment_code FROM prompt_), (SELECT establishment_code FROM prompt_), (SELECT establishment_code FROM prompt_), (SELECT establishment_code FROM prompt_), (SELECT establishment_code FROM prompt_), (SELECT establishment_code FROM prompt_), (SELECT establishment_code FROM prompt_), (SELECT establishment_code FROM prompt_)) AND TRUNC(AT_FACT_OFFENDER_ACTIVITY.START_TIME) BETWEEN TO_DATE('01-04-2019 00:00:00', 'DD-MM-YYYY HH24:MI:SS') AND TO_DATE('31-03-2020 00:00:00', 'DD-MM-YYYY HH24:MI:SS') AND AT_DIM_PROGRAMME_TYPE.DESCRIPTION IN ('AM A WING Gardener', 'PM A WING Gardener', 'Gardens Party', 'Gardens G Wing', 'Gardens Waiting List', 'Gardens Group 1', 'Gardens Group 2', 'Gardens Full Time', 'Gardens FT', 'Gardens Party - Full Time', 'Gardens', '##Gardens', 'Gardens (Service)', 'Downview Garden Designers', 'Allocation on Hold - Gardens', 'Gardens Group', 'HB4 Gardening', 'Garden Party', 'Gardens party(7days)', 'Shift 1 - Gardens Party', 'Shift 2 - Gardens Party', 'Paint Party Outside', 'Outside Work - Community Work', 'Gardens Recycling', 'Gardens Horticulture', 'Outside Work - Driver', 'Outside Work - Staff Mess', 'Outside Work - Gardens', 'Outside Work - Visitor Centre', 'Outside Work - Admin Cleaner', 'Farms & Gardens', 'Community Work Gardens', 'Gardens Assistant', 'Gardens Orderly', 'Gardens Team AM', 'Gardens Recyc', 'Red Band Garden', 'Garden Recyclers', 'Garden Workers', 'Red Band - Gardens', 'Yards & Gardens Team AM', 'Yards & Gardens Team PM', 'Gardens Team PM', 'Gardens Recyc PM', 'Gardens Recyc AM', 'Garden FT', 'Gardens Team Leader', 'Gardens Worker AM', 'Gardens Worker PM', 'Red Band Gardens'))), dataset_ AS (SELECT OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, SURNAME, FIRST_NAME, DESCRIPTION, ACTIVITY_DESCRIPTION, ACTIVITY_SESSION_DATE, ACTIVITY_SESSION_STATUS_DESC35, INITCAP(ACTIVITY_DESCRIPTION) AS V_ACTIVITY_DESCRIPTION_WORDCAP, CASE WHEN ACTIVITY_SESSION_STATUS_DESC35 IS NULL THEN 'Not Recorded' ELSE ACTIVITY_SESSION_STATUS_DESC35 END AS V_ACTIVITY_NOT_RECORDED FROM dataset_base_)

dataset.name: MIS Load
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT BODIMIS.ETL_LOAD_LOG.BUSINESS_DATE FROM BODIMIS.ETL_LOAD_LOG WHERE (BODIMIS.ETL_LOAD_LOG.LOAD_ID = (SELECT MAX(LOAD_ID) FROM BODIMIS.ETL_LOAD_LOG WHERE NOT LOAD_END_DATETIME IS NULL))), dataset_ AS (SELECT BUSINESS_DATE FROM dataset_base_)

filter.name: prefilter_
filter.query: prefilter_ AS (SELECT * FROM dataset_ WHERE V_ACTIVITY_NOT_RECORDED IN ('Attended'))

field.name: $ref:V_ACTIVITY_NOT_RECORDED
field.legacySql: =If(IsNull([Activity Session Status Description]);"Not Recorded";[Activity Session Status Description])
